(:action read ; Read a resource and comprehend its contents
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - readable)
    :precondition (and (available ?actor) (unread ?resource))
    :effect (and (read ?resource) (comprehended ?actor ?resource))

(:action wash ; Wash an item of clothing using appropriate instructions or washing machine
    :parameters (?clothing - clothing ?wm - washing_machine ?instr - instructions)
    :precondition (and (dirty ?clothing)
                       (or (and (read ?instr) (known ?instr))
                           (empty ?wm)))
    :effect (and (clean ?clothing)
                 (not (dirty ?clothing))

(:action check ; General action for checking an item and updating its status
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?agent) (not (checked ?agent ?item)))
    :effect (and (checked ?agent ?item))

(:action clean ; Clean an item and update its status
  :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (worn ?item ?npc) (dirty ?item))
  :effect (and (clean ?item) (not (dirty ?item))
